SUMMARY

Experienced backend engineer with a strong background in Node.js, TypeScript, and Azure, specializing in developing scalable and efficient backend systems for headless ecommerce platforms. Proven track record in API design, database management, and cloud services integration. Passionate about backend development, continuously learning new technologies, and committed to delivering high-quality, resilient software solutions. Skilled in agile methodologies and collaborative teamwork, with excellent communication and problem-solving abilities.
